comment.caption: Olympic Days sports events in Paris - Capital Candidate to host the 2024 Olympic and Paralympic Games
comment.note: Heigh view of Le Grand Palais from 40 meters heigh and bmx area during the Olympic Days on June 23rd and 24th, 2017, Paris is transformed into a giant Olympic park to celebrate Olympic Days where will be held a hundred sports proposed throughout the Paris French territory. Open to the public across the capital to celebrate the olympic day while two days, Paris will be the biggest place for olympic sports as field with an athletic floating track on river Seine between Alexandre III bridge and the Invalides bridge, collective sports grounds at Les Invalides Place, a diving board on the Alexandre III bridge and other sports events. This will be an opportunity for Parisians to discover further and different sports, it is also an action to show to the world that Paris, town candidate, is ready to host the Olympic and Paralympic Games of 2024. Paris, FRANCE, EUROPE - 24/06/2017//ALLAMANSTEPHANE__1DX9391_bis/Credit:Stephane Allaman/SIPA/1706260639
